response:
MRI is the gold standard to visualize demyelinating plaques and establish dissemination in space and time. Serology is vital to distinguish MS from NMOSD/MOGAD and other inflammatory or infectious mimics. CSF analysis supports the diagnosis of MS via oligoclonal bands.
